procedure.title: Create a VPC in GCP
procedure.context: Set up a secure network for your project

steps.details: Navigate to VPC Networks in Cloud Console under Networking section
steps.checkpoint: You should see existing VPCs listed

steps.details: Select 'Create VPC Network' button in top toolbar
Enter a descriptive name like 'prod-vpc-us'. Use lowercase and hyphens only.
steps.checkpoint: Name field shows green checkmark if valid

steps.details: Choose Custom mode to create subnets manually. Auto mode creates one per region.
Click 'Add Subnet', name it (e.g. 'subnet-us-west1'), select region, set IP range (10.0.0.0/24)
Keep default firewall rules enabled for now (allow-internal, allow-ssh)
Verify all settings, then click 'Create'. This takes 30-60 seconds.

completion.nextSteps: Now you can launch VMs into this network.
